features.name: Share Your Voice button
features.description: A prominent button in the main navigation. Its specific functionality and target page are not detailed in the provided content, but its presence suggests a mechanism for users to contribute content.

features.name: Search/Filter System
features.description: Located under 'Discover Voice Stories'. It includes a magnifying glass icon (ğŸ”) next to 'Filter by Vibe'. While not a traditional free-text search field, it functions as a tag-based filtering system.
features.location: Under 'Community Voices' section, next to 'Discover Voice Stories'.
features.functionality: Filters voice stories based on predefined 'Vibe' categories.

features.name: Tag-based filtering system (Filter by Vibe)
features.description: Allows users to filter voice stories by specific categories, referred to as 'Vibes'.

features.name: Reaction buttons
features.description: Located below each voice story under the question 'How does this make you feel?'. Users can react with various emotional responses.
features.behavior: Each reaction type displays a numerical counter. The content shows current counts (e.g., 'ğŸ’¡Aha!1', 'Community Score: 11 reactions'). The provided text does not explicitly state if these counters dynamically increase upon user clicks, but their presence suggests interactivity.

features.name: Reply system
features.description: Appears below each voice story and its reactions. Indicates the presence of a commenting or reply feature.
features.status: Currently shows 'No replies yet. Be the first to respond!', indicating an empty reply section and a prompt for user interaction.

features.name: User registration/Sign-in flow
features.description: A 'Sign In' link is available in the main navigation. The specific steps or requirements for registration/sign-in are not detailed in the provided content.
